Text: wow you are the BEST OF THE BEST ty.. Can you get destination truth season 1,2,3,4 for us ty again..
what does english sdh subs mean ? do we need the subs if we speak english ?
Anyone know why Patching DTS doesn't work in MKV2VOB anymore?  Is it the rips?
English SDH is just english subtitles with the sound effects ( *Explosions*, *Music Playing*) as well, but as the spoken language is English as stated int he description, you do not need the subs

I keep seeing the question "if it is in English why do we need English subs??"  To which I say be grateful that you are able to hear, deaf people, English or otherwise, never ask why you need subs ;-)
A lot of foreign people can understand what is written, but not what is spoken. The subtitles help alot ;]
subtitles are also for deaf people... :(
